query: ALTER TABLE member_profiles ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS avatarIcon VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'mushroom-1'; ALTER TABLE member_profiles ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS avatarColor VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '#8B5CF6'; ALTER TABLE member_profiles ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS journeyStage VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'researching'; ALTER TABLE member_profiles ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS joinReasons TEXT; ALTER TABLE member_profiles ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isPublic BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true;
